events.message: We have received your application for the software engineer position and are excited to review your experience and skills.
Your application has been categorized under the engineering department focusing on software development roles suitable to your background.
A recruiter specializing in engineering hires has been assigned to assist you through the next steps of the recruitment process.
We conducted an initial screening of your profile, evaluating your software development skills and previous project experience.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming your availability for the technical interview next week.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for April 10th at 14:00 UTC with our senior software development team.
The technical interview was completed successfully, with positive feedback regarding your coding skills and problem-solving abilities.
We have scheduled an HR interview for April 15th at 11:00 UTC to discuss your fit within the company culture and benefits.
The HR interview went well, and the recruiter noted your enthusiasm and alignment with company values.
We are pleased to extend a formal offer for the software engineer position, complete with competitive compensation and benefits.
Thank you for your feedback regarding the offer; we appreciate your consideration and are glad the terms meet your expectations.
You have accepted the job offer officially, and we are excited to welcome you to the engineering team.
Your onboarding process has started; welcome sessions and access to developer tools are being provided to ensure a smooth start.
The hiring process is now officially closed. We are thrilled to have you on board as a member of our software engineering division.
